resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75111</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75111</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>73ed6cd3-80c6-4acd-8c28-f6f49b6cbb1b#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A nyelv felszíne</string>
            <string language="en">Surface of the tongue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Oberfläche der Zunge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Surface de la langue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Superfície da lingüeta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Superficie della linguetta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιφάνεια της γλώσσας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Superficie de la lengüeta</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A nyelv felszínének szerkezetét szemléltető rajz</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing demonstrating the structure of the tongue's surface</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">ízlelés,  nyelv,  ízlelőbimbók,  érzékszerv,  </string>
            <string language="en">tasting, tongue, taste buds, organ of sense</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen, die Struktur der Oberfläche der Zunge 
demonstrierend</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dessin démontrant la structure de la surface de 
la langue</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhar demonstrando a estrutura da superfície 
da lingüeta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissipare dimostrando la struttura della 
superficie della linguetta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός καταδεικνύοντας τη δομή της επιφάνειας της 
γλώσσας</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El trazar demostrando la estructura de la 
superficie de la lengüeta</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tasting, Zunge, Geschmack knospt, Organ der Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'échantillon, langue, goût bourgeonne, organe de 
sens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o gosto, lingüeta, gosto buds, órgão do sentido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'assaggio, linguetta, gusto germoglia, organo di senso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δοκιμή, γλώσσα, οφθαλμοί προτίμησης, όργανο της αίσθησης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la prueba, lengüeta, gusto florece, órgano del 
sentido</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

        </educational>
        <rights>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:

end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>

            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
